name: Rusty  (Ithorian)
content:
Rusty was a male Ithorian who served the Alliance to Restore the Republic. Rusty was present for the Rescue of Han Solo, where he saved Lando Calrissian from falling into the Great Pit of Carkoon.
Rusty was created for the Star Wars Legends continuity as the character Noga-ta in Geonosis and the Outer Rim Worlds. He was given the nickname "Rusty" in "Escape from the Jedi Temple", an episode of LEGO Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles which is non-canon within the Legends continuity. He then appeared in "Gambit on Geonosis", an episode of LEGO Star Wars: Droid Tales, where he was voiced by Eric Bauza.
